about_the_game:
Add 12 beautiful Waifus to Senpai Puzzle: Waifu Summer!

12 new sliding puzzles with increasing difficulty to solve.
Be rewarded with an up close view of your Waifus in the gallery!

Add these new Summer Waifus to your collection now for FREE with Kairaku Waifus!

content_descriptors.notes:
These Summer Waifus are in revealing bikini's that may not be appropriate for everyone. If you don't want to see bare arms, legs and midriff you should turn away now!!!

There is no nudity, sexual acts or anything you wouldn't show your parents. (Although they may be disappointed in you.)

detailed_description:
Add 12 beautiful Waifus to Senpai Puzzle: Waifu Summer!

12 new sliding puzzles with increasing difficulty to solve.
Be rewarded with an up close view of your Waifus in the gallery!

Add these new Summer Waifus to your collection now for FREE with Kairaku Waifus!
name: Senpai Puzzle: Waifu Summer - Kairaku Waifus

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 47 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: More than likely will work on requirements less than this.

short_description: Add 12 beautiful Waifus to Senpai Puzzle: Waifu Summer!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
